name: Moon Miner (Meechuu, kaprics)
description:
Embark on an adventure as a rover stranded on the moon, where you must explore, mine precious ores, and solve mini-games to gather resources and connect satellites with wires to restore power with Earth. Upgrade your rover, manage battery usage, and strategically plan your return to Earth in this thrilling lunar mining expedition!


Objective:
Your main goal is to return to Earth from the moon. To do so, you'll need to gather resources, including lithium and copper ores, by playing mini-games. You can use these ores to buy extra batteries and wires to connect satellites and restore power with Earth. Once all satellites are connected, you can use the rocket next to your base to return to Earth. Returning to the base also recharges your battery and allows you to buy upgrades.

Controls:
Use the arrow keys or WASD keys to move your rover around the moon's surface.
Press the "Right Mouse Button" to connect wires to satellites when you're near them.
Press the "Tab" key to open the upgrade shop and buy extra batteries and wires using lithium and copper ores while in base.
Play mini-games to mine ores.

Tips:
*Your base is your charger!*

Look for mini-games in different areas of the moon's surface to mine ores, and try to complete them successfully to collect more resources.
Plan your routes carefully to conserve battery power and make efficient use of your resources.
Prioritize connecting all the satellites with wires to restore power with Earth, as it's necessary to complete the game.
Manage your resources wisely and buy upgrades strategically to improve your chances of successfully returning to Earth.
